Filter At Any Strip

Source: R/format.R
filter_at_any_strip.Rd

Filter At Any Strip

filter_at_any_strip(data, strip_cols, ...)

Examples

library(tidyverse)
library(chariot)

test_data <-
        queryAthena("SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 20;",
                    cache_only = TRUE)

#> [2021-01-01 17:58:14]	Loading Cache...
#> [2021-01-01 17:58:14]	Cached SQL: SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 20;

merge_strip(data = test_data,
            into = "concept")

#> Error in merge_strip(data = test_data, into = "concept"): missing column names: concept_id, concept_name, domain_id, vocabulary_id, concept_class_id, standard_concept, concept_code, valid_start_date, valid_end_date, invalid_reason

merge_strip(data = test_data,
            into = "concept",
            vocabulary_id,
            concept_class_id)

#> Error in merge_strip(data = test_data, into = "concept", vocabulary_id,     concept_class_id): missing column names: concept_id, concept_name, domain_id, vocabulary_id, concept_class_id, standard_concept, concept_code, valid_start_date, valid_end_date, invalid_reason

test_output <- merge_strip(data = test_data,
                        into = "concept") %>%
                dplyr::select(-concept_id)

#> Error in merge_strip(data = test_data, into = "concept"): missing column names: concept_id, concept_name, domain_id, vocabulary_id, concept_class_id, standard_concept, concept_code, valid_start_date, valid_end_date, invalid_reason

# Filter at a Strip Column
filter_strip(test_output,
             strip_col = concept,
             vocabulary_id %in% c("RxNorm"))

#> Error in is.data.frame(x): object 'test_output' not found

# Filter at more than 1 Strip Column
test_data <-
        queryAthena("SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10;",
                    cache_only = TRUE) %>%
        merge_strip(into = "concept")

#> [2021-01-01 17:58:14]	Loading Cache...
#> [2021-01-01 17:58:14]	Cached SQL: SELECT * FROM omop_vocabulary.concept ORDER BY RANDOM() LIMIT 10;
#> Error in merge_strip(., into = "concept"): missing column names: concept_id, concept_name, domain_id, vocabulary_id, concept_class_id, standard_concept, concept_code, valid_start_date, valid_end_date, invalid_reason

test_data <-
        dplyr::bind_cols(test_data %>%
                                 rubix::randomize() %>%
                                 dplyr::select(concept_a = concept),
                         test_data %>%
                                 rubix::randomize() %>%
                                 dplyr::select(concept_b = concept))

#> Error: 

filter_at_all_strip(data = test_data,
                strip_cols = c("concept_a",
                               "concept_b"),
                all = TRUE,
                vocabulary_id %in% c("RxNorm"))

#> Error: 

filter_at_any_strip(data = test_data,
                    strip_cols = c("concept_a",
                                   "concept_b"),
                    all = TRUE,
                    vocabulary_id %in% c("RxNorm"))

#> Error:
